Author: Phil
Comment: I understand its appeal but I’ve had trouble fitting it into my workflow. Even if I did, it’d just be another “readme” source that I’d need to schedule in somehow.

Author: Nathan
Comment: The main benefit I’ve found of instapaper here is that it can email your kindle all of your “read later” articles every day.

Author: Phil
Comment: Yes, now that I have a kindle I’m starting to reasses this!

Author: Tim Allen
Comment: I’ve been using Instapaper with my Kindle along side KindleFeeder for RSS feeds. So far I’ve got better results with Instapaper but that’s probably because I filter out the articles I don’t want to read before adding it…
